div.h3: Serving the communities of Barrington, Haddon Heights, Lawnside, and Merchantville

strong.style: color: rgb(59, 64, 64); font-size: 18px; letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif;

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(59, 64, 64);

p.span: , in collaboration with our students, families, and communities, will provide diverse and challenging learning experiences in a safe and nurturing environment with the goal of developing creative, successful lifelong learners. We strive to cultivate learning communities that promote the building of character which will enable our students to contribute to their communities in meaningful and positive ways.
